channel.title: How do i make NPC's and people have armour automatically? and
channel.description:
how do I? and how do i make a admin crown near my name cause i'm using blackscape as a source. PLS EXPLAIN
thanks

item.title: How do i make NPC's and people have armour automatically? and
item.dc:creator: @redsox3334 redsox3334
item.description:
@redsox3334 wrote:

it’s player.java. with notepad, its all jumbled, so i imported it with eclipse to use as a guide where everything is. There might be a commented out piece of code that has armor listings, and if you do look at it in something like eclipse or jbuilder, youll know what im talling about. there should be a bunch of “”.random, you can change those to item #s as seen in item.java.

Read full topic

@redneck97 wrote:

ok first ill start with ur crown…

goto charcters folder and find ur name click on it and read u should see something saying rights change that to 2 for admin 3 for owner

second u want pepole to have armor when they log on?
